title.rendered: Right-wing extremism is a serious threat to democracy in the U.S. and many other countries

content.rendered:
The right-wing attacks on honest democracy in the U.S. are occurring in other nations too.  They SERIOUSLY THREATEN democracy in the U.S. and elsewhere.  Ordinary people need to organize smart strategies to protect honest democracy, human rights, immigrants, religious minorities, etc.

Here are some recent relevant articles:

 

It can happen here: Lessons from ‘Rise of the Nazis’ on 90th anniversary of Hitler’s coming to power:  https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2023/2/2/2149419/-It-can-happen-here-Lessons-from-Rise-of-the-Nazis-on-90th-anniversary-of-Hitler-s-coming-to-power?detail=emaildkre&pm_source=DKRE&pm_medium=email

 

Right-wing extremists dominate some nations and promote chaos instead of competent governance: John Feffer wrote this article explaining that House Republicans, Euroskeptics, Vladimir Putin, and Jair Bolsonaro are the agents of a new kind of political disorder that parallels the chaos of failing states, economic catastrophe, and climate disasters:  https://fpif.org/the-rise-of-self-hating-politicians/?emci=90ebbcc2-6593-ed11-9d7b-00224832e811&emdi=993e8016-7393-ed11-9d7b-00224832e811&ceid=3993183

 

It’s not just Trump: A sobering new report chronicles the extensive GOP war on democracy:  https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/politics/it-s-not-just-trump-a-sobering-new-report-chronicles-the-extensive-gop-war-on-democracy/ar-AA16fL09?rc=1&ocid=winp1taskbar&cvid=dd64042b63ab471dd84fd320a451a57a

 

I wrote this short encouragement in July 2022:  Authoritarianism is replacing democracy in several parts of the world.  In the U.S., Turkey, parts of Europe, etc., authoritarianism (with fascist tendencies) is displacing democracy.  This is yet one more problem that is GLOBAL in scope and requires a GLOBAL solution.  We who value honest democracy must reach out to our friends and our organizational allies who support democracy, while we also reach out to those who want peace, a sustainable climate, global economic justice, etc., etc., etc.

 

Sometime soon I will be posting more information specifically about the sabotage of democracy in U.S., caused by the Republican Party and other corrupting influences.
